DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the incidence of congenital undescended testis of mature boys, at one year of age, born in the Medical Centre Alkmaar (MCA).
DOC.brief_title: The Incidence of Congenital Undescended Testis Among Dutch Infants
DOC.detailed_description: The position of the testes of mature boys will be registered at birth and boys with a high-scrotal, non-scrotal or dubious position of the testis/ testes will be followed up (till the age of one year).
DOC.criteria: mature newborns (>/= 37 weeks) born in the Medical Centre Alkmaar premature newborns (< 37 weeks)
